name: Murders at Moorcliffe (Detective RPG)
description:
You are private eye.

 During an extravagant birthday celebration a man has fallen from the upper floor.  

The death is suspicious so you have demanded the staff lock down the ballroom so you can investigate the scene.

             

Investigate the four suspects and determine which one of them committed the murder!

Murders of Moorcliffe is a short, 3D, visual novel esque detective game. This game is a student project and currently a demo only. 

Enjoy exploring the ballroom to find clues, question suspects, and refer back to your casefile where you keep information. There are 4 different endings depending on which suspect you accuse. 

Feedback would be greatly appreciated!

Programming by faye

Characters and animation by   Fippler 

Environment art and technical art by scorpiius 

Environment art by matthewcaddie
